mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, board_qna_comment.regdate FROM board_qna_comment INNER JOIN board_user ON board_qna_comment.writer = board_user.id WHERE num=#{num} ORDER BY num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_qna_comment (num, writer, content, target_id,regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, SYSDATE)
